revision.text:
{{Wired embedded system |brand=Check Point |model=Safe@Office |revision=1000N (SBXN-100-1) |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |type=security appliance |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=2 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_barrel_outer=5.5 |pwr_barrel_inner=2.1 |pwr_barrel_len=9.5 |cpu1_brand=Cavium |cpu1_model=CN5010 |cpu1_cspeed=300 |fla1=128 |fla1_brand=Samsung |fla1_model=K9F1G08U0C-PCB0 |fla2=2 |fla2_brand=Macronix |fla2_model=MX29LV160DBTI-70G |ram1=128 |ram1_brand=Hynix |ram1_model=H5PS5162FFR-Y5C |ram1_num=2 |jtag=yes,, 14-pin header,, unpopulated,, J10 |serial=yes,, console port,, RJ45 |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip2_brand=Marvell |eth_chip2_model=88E1111 |eth_chip3_brand=Marvell |eth_chip3_model=88E1111 |sw_brand=Marvell |sw_model=98DX106 |lan_speed=1GbE |lan_ports=2 |wan_speed=1GbE |wan_ports=4 |addl_chips=CMOS Real Time Clock;NXP;PCF8563;;1;,,, Hardware Monitoring IC;Winbond;W83L786G;;1;,,, Gigabit Quad Ethernet Transceiver;Marvell;88E1240;;1;,,, Low Cost Oscillator PLL Clock Multiplier;Renesas;ICS512;;1;,,, Low Cost Oscillator PLL Clock Generator;Renesas;ICS514;;1;,,, +5V Precision Voltage Reference;Texas Instruments;REF02;;1;,,, Multichannel RS-232 Line Driver;Texas Instruments;MA3243C;;1;,,, 5A Low Dropout Positive Adjustable Regulator;Anpec;APL1084;;1;,,, 2A 23V 380kHz Step-Down Converter;Monolithic Power;MP1412;;2;,,, 6A 21V 600kHz Step-Down Converter;Monolithic Power;MP8666DN;;1;,,, Quadruple 2-Input Positive-AND Gate;Texas Instruments;SN74AHC08;;1;,,, 30V 12.5A Single N-Channel Logic Level MOSFET;Fairchild;FDS6680A;;5;,,, High-Efficiency Triple-Output System Power Supply Controller;Renesas;ISL62392;;1; |flags=RTC w/ battery, heatsink, metal case |oui_eth=00:08:DA }} {{TagLine|Check Point Safe@Office 1000N}}
"GA-SN0100", "Ver:1.2" and "PCB MADE IN CHINA" are silkscreened on board.
===Hardware specification=== *CPU: ''[[Cavium]]'' CN5010 [[MIPS64]] (@300MHz) *Memory: 128MB (SDRAM) DDR2 *Storage: 2MB Parallel NOR Flash, 128MB NAND Flash *Network: 6x Gigabit Ethernet
==Images== <gallery> File:Check Point SafeOffice 1000N Top.jpeg|Board Top File:Check Point SafeOffice 1000N Bottom.jpeg|Board Bottom </gallery>[[Has images::internal| ]]
